full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSANGS KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KYI GZI 'OD 'BAR BA NGO MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B (CES BSANGS KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KYI GZI 'OD 'BAR @023A *, ,BA NGO MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS CHO 'BRANGS SOGS YON TAN DU MA'I DPAL GYIS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING, KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA, RNAM PAR DPYOD PA'I MIG YANGS GA-YO BAS SHES BYA'I DKYIL 'KHOR MTHA' DAG LA GZIGS PA GSAL BA SOGS, DAM PAS BSNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA, LCANG RA NAS SDE PA RIN PO CHE'I DON GRUB RAB BRTAN SKU MCHED KYI BAGS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, DPAL 'KHOR BDE CHEN DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DGE BAR GYUR CIG, MAR ME MDZAD SOGS RTZA BRGYUD BLA MA YI, ,BKA' SDOD LHA YI DGE BSNYEN PHYING DKAR BA, ,NE SER JO BO CHEN POR MTSAN GRAGS PA, ,'KHOR BCAS 'DIR SBYON MTHUN PA'I MCHOD GTOR BZHES, ,DNGOS DANG YID KYIS SPRUL PA'I MCHOD PA'I SPRIN, ,PHYI NANG GSANG BA NAM MKHA' GANG BA DANG, ,GTOR TSOGS GSER SKYEMS MTSO LTAR BSKYIL BA 'DI, ,BDUD RTZIR BYIN RLABS 'KHOR DANG BCAS LA 'BUL, ,GSER ZHUN 'BAR 'DRA'I YE SHES ME NANG DU, ,RMAD BYUNG SPOS NA BSANGS RDZAS BRGYA PHRAG DAG, BSREGS PA'I DUD SPRIN 'CHI MED LAM GANG BAS, ,CHOS SKYONG DGE BSNYEN CHEN PO @023B 'KHOR BCAS BSANGS, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG THUGS KYI PHO NYA NI, ,SNA TSOGS SPRUL PA'I GAR GYIS RNAM ROL BAS, ,CHOS 'KHOR SKYONG ZHING RNAL 'BYOR BU BZHIN DU, ,SKYONG MDZAD DGRA LHA CHEN PO KHYOD LA BSTOD, ,BKRA SHIS LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I CHOS GRVA CHE, ,RTAG TU BSRUNG SKYOB DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,BDAG CAG GZHI BYAS GANG DU CI BYED KYANG, ,GA-YEL MED GROGS MDZOD BSAMS DON CHOS BZHIN SGRUB, ,CES JO BO NE SER BA'I BSTOD PA 'PHRIN LAS MYUR GRUB 'DI NI, DAD CAN 'PHRIN LAS DPAL 'BYOR GYIS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR,, BKA' GDAMS KYI BTZUN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,CHOS GRVA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS KYIS GZIMS KHANG DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,DGE'O,, ,,)
